statements: UPDATE vulnerability_assessments SET assessment_type='Penetration Test', assessment_date='2022-10-15' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE vulnerability_assessments SET security_weakness='Insecure API endpoints', remediation_action='Implement access controls' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE vulnerability_assessments SET remediation_action = 'Patch latest security updates', security_weakness = 'Weak authentication' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE vulnerability_assessments SET assessment_type = 'Network Penetration Test', assessment_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE vulnerability_assessments SET assessment_name = 'Initial Assessment',severity_level = 'Low' WHERE assessment_id = 1;
UPDATE remediation_actions SET action_description = 'Update firewall settings',action_status = 'Completed' WHERE action_id = 5;
UPDATE vulnerability_assessments SET severity_level = 'High' WHERE assessment_id = 1;
UPDATE remediation_actions SET action_description = 'Implement security patches', action_status = 'Completed' WHERE assessment_id = 2;
UPDATE vulnerability_assessment SET severity='High', description='Critical vulnerability identified' WHERE id=1
UPDATE remediation SET action_taken='Patched the vulnerability', date_completed='2021-08-10' WHERE vulnerability_id=1
UPDATE vulnerability_assessment SET severity = 'High' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE remediation SET action_taken = 'Patched vulnerability' WHERE vulnerability_id = 10 AND regulations_id = 5;
UPDATE vulnerability_assessments SET findings = 'High risk findings identified, immediate action required' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE security_weaknesses SET remediation_actions = 'Update firewall rules for enhanced security' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE vulnerability_assessments SET remediation_plan = 'Implement security patches' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE regulations SET enforcement_date = '2022-09-30', compliance_requirement = 'Enhanced data protection measures' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE vulnerabilities SET vulnerability_description = 'Updated vulnerability description' WHERE vulnerability_id = 1;
UPDATE assessments SET assessment_type = 'Penetration Test' WHERE assessment_id = 3;
UPDATE vulnerabilities SET severity_level = 3, vulnerability_description = 'Updated description' WHERE vulnerability_id = 1;
UPDATE assessment_results SET result_details = 'Details updated', assessment_id = 2 WHERE result_id = 3;
